mods.abstract: Typed invoice for an order placed by the Madison Civic Center for 100 two color window cards announcing a Horse Show at the Madison Civic Club Park in Madison, Tennessee on June 21. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description. To view the posters for draft for this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40637 to view the poster for this order see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40652.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
